title: The Sinking home
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Manila (Philippines) - Social conditions
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Asia, Southeastern
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Poverty - Children
abstract: The long conversations and music that would play into the evening.
description: Cam Sugden pays tribute to Mary, the matriarch of a poor Phillippino household in Manila. Despite living in a slum, Mary has endeavoured to create a large cocoon to protect her family. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002062; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2010); Active; 2010
